ComicInfo.Title: X Part One
ComicInfo.Summary: Our heroes journey to the Chasm Community, a mining facility built in a hole where Stonehenge is supposed to be. When Cole searches for the Engine and Fiona's body, he instead finds himself face to face with the Chasm leader ? the ex-slave turned entrepreneur, Mambutu X. Plus, Vicki's made a deal with Faust to let her bring Absinthe the Engine. But will she betray Cole, or is there more to her mysterious double-dealing?
